question.sentence: If YOU were my teacher, I'd really study hard.
If I wrote a book, it would be a FANTASY story.
If I gave a party, I'd invite ALL of my friends.
If I moved to Brazil, I'd have to learn PORTUGUESE.
If he was MY husband, I'd leave him tomorrow.
If EVERYBODY did it, I would too.
If there were TEN days in a week, I still wouldn't have enough time.
If SHE was Prime Minister, things would be different.
